Key Arguments: The bill gives a small group of people the power to decide what is information versus disinformation.
The bill could reduce freedom of speech.
The bill may hinder good debate by not allowing both sides to share information equally.
Social media should be a platform for free speech, akin to a modern-day town square.
Notable Quotes: I am concerned that this bill will give a small group of people the power to decide what is information vs disinformation.
Social media is our modern day town square, please allow us to speak freely.
